member.name: T:libenc.FileHashLib
member.summary: Performs checksums of files

member.name: M:libenc.FileHashLib.SHA1Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: Making SHA1 checksum of any file.
member.param: The file to open for reading.
member.returns: Returns the SHA1 checksum of the selected file.

member.name: M:libenc.FileHashLib.SHA256Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: Making SHA256 checksum of any file.
member.param: The file to open for reading.
member.returns: Returns the SHA256 checksum of the selected file.

member.name: M:libenc.FileHashLib.SHA384Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: Making SHA384 checksum of any file.
member.param: The file to open for reading.
member.returns: Returns the SHA384 checksum of the selected file.

member.name: M:libenc.FileHashLib.SHA512Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: Making SHA512 checksum of any file.
member.param: The file to open for reading.
member.returns: Returns the SHA512 checksum of the selected file.

member.name: M:libenc.FileHashLib.MD5Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: Making MD5 checksum of any file.
member.param: The file to open for reading.
member.returns: Returns the MD5 checksum of the selected file.

member.name: T:libenc.TextDecoding
member.summary: Performs Decoding of texts

member.name: M:libenc.TextDecoding.Base64Decode(System.String)
member.summary: The base64-encoded text is converted to string data type.

member.name: M:libenc.TextDecoding.UrlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string that has been encoded for transmission in a URL into a decoded string.

member.name: M:libenc.TextDecoding.HtmlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.

member.name: T:libenc.TextEncoding
member.summary: Performs Encoding of texts

member.name: M:libenc.TextEncoding.Base64Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts text to the equivalent string representation encoded in base-64 digits.
member.param: Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
member.returns: The string representation, in base 64, of the contents of texts.

member.name: M:libenc.TextEncoding.UrlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes a URL string.

member.name: M:libenc.TextEncoding.UrlEncode(System.Uri)
member.summary: Encodes a URL string.
member.param: The Uri type of text to encode.

member.name: M:libenc.TextEncoding.HtmlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.

member.name: T:libenc.TextHashLib
member.summary: Performs checksums of texts

member.name: M:libenc.TextHashLib.SHA1Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: Making SHA1 checksum of any text.
member.param: Represents text as a sequence of UTF-8 code units.
member.returns: Returns the SHA1 checksum of the typed text.

member.summary: Making SHA256 checksum of any text.

member.summary: Making SHA384 checksum of any text.

member.returns: Returns the SHA384 checksum of the typed text.
